definition.name: Create Cloud Deploy Release
definition.description: Use this action to create a release in Cloud Deploy.
definition.author: Google LLC

inputs.name: delivery_pipeline
inputs.description: The delivery pipeline to use for the release.

inputs.name: region
inputs.description: Region in which the delivery pipeline can be found.

inputs.name: source
inputs.description: The location of the files to be included in the release.

inputs.name: build_artifacts
inputs.description: Path to a Skaffold output file containing the details of the image(s) to be released.

inputs.name: disable_initial_rollout
inputs.description: Prevent the release being deployed to the first target in the delivery pipeline.

inputs.name: gcs_source_staging_dir
inputs.description: A directory in Google Cloud Storage to copy the source used for staging the build.

inputs.name: skaffold_file
inputs.description: Path of the skaffold file absolute or relative to the source directory.

inputs.name: annotations
inputs.description: Add additional annotations to the release.

inputs.name: labels
inputs.description: Add additional labels to the release.

inputs.name: description
inputs.description: Include a description of the release.

inputs.name: deploy_parameters
inputs.description: Additional parameters to supply at release creation time.

inputs.name: project_id
inputs.description: The Google Cloud Project ID. If unset, this is inherited from the environment.

inputs.name: flags
inputs.description:
Space separated list of other Cloud Deploy flags, examples can be found:
https://cloud.google.com/sdk/gcloud/reference/deploy/releases/create#FLAGS
Example: '--from-k8s-manifest=manifest.yaml --skaffold-version=skaffold_preview'

inputs.name: gcloud_version
inputs.description:
Version of the Cloud SDK to install. If unspecified or set to "latest",
the latest available gcloud SDK version for the target platform will be
installed. Example: "290.0.1".

inputs.name: gcloud_component
inputs.description:
Version of the Cloud SDK components to install and use. If unspecified, the latest
or released version will be used. This is the equivalent of running
'gcloud alpha run' or 'gcloud beta run'. Valid values are `alpha` or `beta`.

outputs.name: name
outputs.description:
The full name of the release in Cloud Deploy, including project and
pipeline names, as well as the chosen name of the release itself.

outputs.name: link
outputs.description: A link to the Cloud Deploy release in the Google Cloud Web Console.
